targets.expr:
(
    max_over_time( max(mbmd_measurement_energy_exported_total{device_name="se17kpv",unit="kWh"}>0)[$__range:10s] )
    -
    min_over_time( min(mbmd_measurement_energy_exported_total{device_name="se17kpv",unit="kWh"}>0)[$__range:10s] )
)
+
(
    max_over_time( max(mbmd_measurement_energy_exported_total{device_name="se10kpv",unit="kWh"}>0)[$__range:10s] )
    -
    min_over_time( min(mbmd_measurement_energy_exported_total{device_name="se10kpv",unit="kWh"}>0)[$__range:10s] )
)
-
(
    max_over_time( max(mbmd_measurement_energy_exported_total{device_name="se10kgrid",unit="kWh"}>0)[$__range:10s] )
    -
    min_over_time( min(mbmd_measurement_energy_exported_total{device_name="se10kgrid",unit="kWh"}>0)[$__range:10s] )
)

panels.description:
Parameter   Value   Description
I_STATUS_OFF        1         Off
I_STATUS_SLEEPING   2     Sleeping (auto-shutdown) – Night mode
I_STATUS_STARTING   3     Grid Monitoring/wake-up
I_STATUS_MPPT       4     Inverter is ON and producing power
I_STATUS_THROTTLED  5     Production (curtailed)
I_STATUS_SHUTTING_DOWN 6     Shutting down
I_STATUS_FAULT      7     Fault
I_STATUS_STANDBY    8         Maintenance/setup
panels.title: Operating Status

panels.description: > 900 means that 900 is the kWh count of already imported energy ... because the counter does not start from 0
panels.title: Energy Imported last 7 days

panels.description: > 2984 means that 2984 is the kWh count of already exported energy ... because the counter does not start from 0
panels.title: Energy Exported last 7 days
Energy Meter AC Watt/Power per Inverter
